Articles.Content:
Fry it and I will eat it.

The user below me thinks a bag of potato chips and a soda is a meal.

False. I do not drink soda.

The user below me will provide me a replacement core for my Hyper-V, 112 tons of deuterium, and a miniature black hole suitable for a Portal Gun.

I will not. It is against every atom of my existence to give ANYTHING to someone who doesn't drink soda.

The user below me hasn't seen this yet:

False.

The user below me will provide me a replacement core for my Hyper-V, 112 tons of deuterium, and a miniature black hole suitable for a Portal Gun. And I will drink soda for it.

False, I don't have HAZ-MAT certification and even if I did it'd be really hard to get what you wanted.

The user below me has a job at a Nuclear Power Plant.

He does not.

The user below me will say false.

True. "false"

The person below me has read a good book within 1 month of this post.

Incorrect

The person below me wishes they could make art. *Proceeds to have terrifying flashbacks of trying but horribly failing*

I don't, but I wish I would be an astronaut.

The next person works for NASA (National Aeronautics & Space Administration).

Nope. Was my former dream, but yea...

The user below me is a ghost.

Ghosts don't type very well, partly they can go through something...

The next user have registered in 2012, regardless of the month you registered.

Yes, and no. I had an account prior to the catastrophe, which was made in November or December 2012.

The user below me is not Designer22 or ROFLcopter64bit.

Why? Are you tired of us?

The next user would swear to not having two of us going again.

False. I enjoy being on the forums.

The user below me would like to be fired by my Hyper-V.

If your Hyper-V is a boss...

The next person ises an x64 operating system.

Not on this laptop. But on my desktop computer.

The user below me can help me construct another core for the Hyper-V (please say yes)

The heck's a Hyper-V? I'm guessing No.

The person below me has watched a YT video by The Onion.
Accidental Doublepost. Please Move on.

No?

The user below me has a buggy post count that does not go up (apparently) whenever you post.

(It's happening to me... )

False, posts in offtopic do not count.

The user below me has recovered from the DDoS.

No, still recovering after losing much of about 850 posts...

The next user isn't doing nothing.

True, but I should be doing homework.

The user below me has played Bubsy (And if you haven't you're dead to me, until you do)

How old are you?

The next user is ROFLCoptor64bits.

Naturally.

How old are you?

I did not expect anyone to get that. You sir, are awesome. 14, by the way.

The user has laughed when watching this.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Fl0TEtHvvO0
The user below me smells like old cheese
